overview: When you're out and you meet someone, and you just have to fuck them immediately, you drag them into the bathroom and screw thier brains out, right there and then, in a dirty stall.  And that's what me and all my slutty girlfriends did in this movie. There's nothing "charming' about this third time.... it's three times as dirty and nasty as the ones before it!
title: Fuck Me in the Bathroom 3
